item.title: Four of the Apocalypse
item.description: Four of the Apocalypse is a 1975 Italian spaghetti western film directed by Lucio Fulci and starring Fabio Testi, Tomas Milian and Michael J. Pollard.

item.title: Massacre Time
item.description: Massacre Time is a 1966 Italian Spaghetti Western film starring Franco Nero and George Hilton. The film was released in the United States originally as The Brute and the Beast.

item.title: Silver Saddle
item.description: Silver Saddle, is a 1978 Spaghetti Western. It is the third and final western directed by Lucio Fulci and one of the last spaghetti westerns to be produced by a European studio. The film was based on an original story written by screenwriter Adriano Bolzoni and directed by Fulci for the Italian studio Rizzoli Film Productions.
